name: Project Harbinger
description:
THIS IS A DEMO!!

Project Harbinger is a narrative, physics based VR game set in a new completely unexplored world, find interesting tools, fight nonsense creatures and learn about this world as you make your way through the story.

Some of the features included are: 

  • Fully physics based gameplay, from the weapons to the player and enemies, everything is physics based!
  • Many different weapons & enemies to encounter as you progress
  •  Environments with a mix of sci-fi and fantasy styles
  • A multi tool with 3 upgrades, Swinger, Gun & Gravity

Some planned features:

  • Spectator modes for content creation and a better overall non-vr viewing experience
  • Immersive cutscenes
  • As much accessibility as I can fit into the game

How did we get here? - On an unknown planet you venture into the depths of what seems to be an underground abandoned facility. With no way back you push forward through the many sectors to find a way out. With your trusty multi-tool you must swing, shoot and manipulate your way through what remains. But be careful, with the facility being abandoned everything inside is free to roam.
